content: thank you so much for choosing to make my no/low sew beer mugs i had a brewery market coming up and wanted a quick beer pattern so here we are this is a beginner friendly pattern both mugs are worked from bottom to top changing colors along the way the mini mug is completely no sew other than the face embroidery and tacking down the drips the mega mug is low sew because we ll need to attach the handle the mini measures about 3x4 inches and the mega 7x9 inches if you re using the recommended supplies however these work up well in any yarn weight just be sure to select a matching hook size i hope you enjoy making your beer mugs **supplies** yarn -3 colors 1 skein each of bernat blanket yarn mug color seagull gray a beer color burnt mustard b foam color white c -black acrylic to embroider the mouth 6 5 mm hook safety eyes - 16 mm for the mini 30 mm for the mega blunt tipped needle for sewing poly-fil optional running stitch marker 18 gauge wire for mega mug handle *copyright & sellers disclosure all written instructions and photos included in this document are the intellectual property of jessica brewer and may not be copied shared modified sold or reproduced in any way pattern purchase grants the right to sell or gift any products made using this pattern as long as credit is given to the designer when posting on social or in shop listings *
